column4: I just edited my xorg.conf file, and added 1280x1024 to each of my display settings, however it loads in 1024x768 and wont give me the option to put it higher. Why?
Yeah.  I'll do it again I guess
thats what finally set the right resolution in my case... just though i'd point it out
when it asks for the resolution, make sure you select only the one you want...
Ok.  I have a standard monitor.. so above 1024x768 would be... 1152x864?
i'm always on 1400x1050 .. i kinda get lost with all those numbers too so..
My laptop is docked, so I can use this Dell LCD.. i wonder what will happen if i undock
Will it use the same settings?
Since this is an LCD, is it possible to set a separate refresh rate for Vertical and Horizontal?
that stuff is over my head, sorry
